tourBios.carHigh: 2015: T18 at the Canada Qualifying Tournament, shooting rounds of 71-69-71-76.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course is Cherry Hills CC and favorite professional team is the St. Louis Blues. Also follows the University of Colorado teams, the Denver Broncos and the St. Louis Cardinals. ...Considers himself superstitious and keeps three tees in his pocket during competition...Bucket list includes winning a prestigious ping-pong tournament...Favorite athlete is Los Angeles Kings goalie Jonathan Quick...Favorite quote is "If you ain't first, you're last."...Favorite musical group is the Zach Brown Band...Keeps Lemonheads in his golf bag as a snack...Twitter name is @J_Bardgett..

dyn.dynBios: Favorite Athlete: Jonathan Quick (Los Angeles Kings)
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T31st in 2015 at the PC Financial Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T13th in Total Eagles on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
